about.title: About Me
about.intro: I am a Frontend Developer with 2 years of professional experience building responsive, interactive, and high-performance web applications. I specialize in writing clean, maintainable code and delivering excellent user experiences.

careerHighlights.title: Production Experience
careerHighlights.description: Delivered 2+ production-ready web applications with React.js.

careerHighlights.title: Responsive Design
careerHighlights.description: Expert in building applications that work seamlessly on desktop and mobile devices.

careerHighlights.title: Problem Solving
careerHighlights.description: Skilled in debugging, optimizing code, and implementing efficient solutions.

careerHighlights.title: Backend Integration
careerHighlights.description: Experience connecting frontend apps with .NET Core APIs, Java Spring boot,python django and SQL databases like mysql, mssql server.
